original: Kusalo atīto dhammo nakusalassa naatītassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: kusalaḥ atītaḥ dhammaḥ na kusalassa na atītassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā ekādasa, anantare samanantare soḷasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, natthiyā vigate soḷasa. (Anāgataṁ atītasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa adhipatiyā ekādasa anantare samanantare soḷasa upanissaye aṭṭhārasa natthiyāḥ vigate soḷasa anāgatam atīta sadisa
